info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:53PM EDT until September 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Southwestern Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... North central Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 653 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Cowpens National Battlefield, or 10 miles northwest of Gaffney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Boiling Springs NC, Chesnee, Mooresboro, Cowpens National Battlefield, Cliffside, and Henrietta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
